{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Hero text */}
Midland, TX · Licensed Childcare · Ages 6 months – 5 years

Elsie’s Childcare & Learning Center

Guiding little minds with gentle hands, from daylight to moonlight. We partner with working families in Midland to provide a safe, nurturing, and educational home-away-from-home.

Enroll Your Child Schedule a Tour

Hours

Mon–Fri · 6:00 AM – 6:00 PM

Location

Midland, Texas

Class Size

Small groups · Individual care

{/* Hero image / card */}
{/* Replace this with a real image if you have one in /public */} {/* */}

Warm. Safe. Joyful.

A place where children feel loved and parents feel at peace.

Soft Montessori-inspired spaces, engaging centers, and hands-on learning every day.

{/* Floating stats card */}

Play-based

Early learning curriculum

Healthy meals

Snacks & nutrition

Parent app

Updates & photos*

*Coming soon to our parent portal.

{/* Programs Overview */}

Caring programs for every stage

From snuggly infants to curious preschoolers, each classroom is designed to meet children where they are developmentally.

View all programs →
{[ { title: "Infants", age: "6 – 17 months", desc: "Warm, responsive care with lots of cuddles, tummy time, and early sensory play.", }, { title: "Toddlers", age: "18 – 35 months", desc: "Exploring the world through songs, stories, art, and hands-on discovery.", }, { title: "Preschool", age: "3 – 5 years", desc: "Early literacy, math, and social-emotional skills to prepare for kindergarten.", }, ].map((item) => (

{item.age}

{item.title}

{item.desc}

))}
{/* Why Choose Elsie's */}

Why families choose Elsie’s

We know trusting someone with your child is a big decision. That’s why we focus on safety, communication, and genuine love in everything we do.

  • ✓

    Licensed & safety-focused

    Follows Texas DFPS regulations, secure entry, and childproofed classrooms.

  • ✓

    Play-based learning

    Gentle structure with art, music, story time, early math, and literacy woven into the day.

  • ✓

    Strong parent communication

    Daily updates, open-door policy, and a collaborative relationship with your family.

Nutritious snacks included Small teacher-to-child ratios Culturally responsive care
{/* Daily rhythm */}

A gentle daily rhythm

What a typical day looks like

{[ ["6:00 – 8:30 AM", "Drop-off, quiet play, and breakfast"], ["9:00 – 11:00 AM", "Circle time, learning centers, outdoor play"], ["11:30 AM – 1:30 PM", "Lunch and nap / rest time"], ["2:00 – 4:00 PM", "Small group activities, art, music"], ["4:00 – 6:00 PM", "Snack, story time, pick-up & goodbyes"], ].map(([time, activity]) => (

{time}

{activity}

))}

Schedule may vary slightly by age group and individual needs.

{/* Testimonials preview */}

Loved by children, trusted by parents

Here’s what families say about Elsie’s Childcare & Learning Center.

Read more stories →

“My daughter runs to the door every morning. I can see how much love and patience the teachers have for the kids.”

— Parent of a 3-year-old

“As a working parent, having a safe, reliable place like Elsie’s has been life-changing for our family.”

— Parent of siblings, ages 2 & 4

{/* Final CTA strip */}

Ready to visit Elsie’s?

We’d love to meet your family, show you our classrooms, and answer your questions.

Book a Tour Contact Us
); }
